xwikidoc.title: Translations Wiki
xwikidoc.content:
This wiki is used to internationalize all the projects of the [[XWiki Ecosystem>>http://xwiki.org]] (XWiki Enterprise, XWiki Enterprise Manager, etc). It is meant to be a collaborative platform where everyone can contribute translations in a given language.
= Contributing =
You can help! To start adding and updating translations, please register, log in and click on the name of the application you would like to help translate in the panel on the left. Since new messages to translate can be added every day, please check regularly whether new messages are left untranslated.
See also [[Translation Rules page>>L10N.TranslationRules]] to learn more about rules of the translation for each language.
= Found a bug or want to suggest improvements ? =
The original keys and translation can't be changed directly in this wiki. Instead, you should report a problem on [[http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI]].
Have something to report about this wiki itself? Please do this on [[http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XINFRA]].
= Latest Translations =
